title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect solution to keep you warm and cozy in any room! This ETL certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan is ideal for your Home, Dorm, Office, or Kitchen. 

With three modes to choose from - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - you can customize your comfort level. Safety is a top priority with overheat protection and automatic shutoff at 45 degrees. 

This sleek black heater delivers rapid heating in just 2 seconds, thanks to its PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element. At a noise level below 45 dB, you can enjoy quiet operation while staying warm. 

Compact in size at 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and lightweight at 2.6 pounds, this heater is portable and easy to move around. Don't let the cold weather get you down - stay snug and warm with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat!

Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect solution to keep you warm and cozy this winter! This ETL certified ceramic portable heater fan is ideal for use in your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. With dimensions of 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighing only 2.6 pounds, it's compact and easy to move around.

This space heater offers three modes: 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation fan mode. Safety is a top priority with features like overheat protection and automatic shutoff at 45 degrees. The PTC heating element delivers warmth in just 2 seconds, while keeping noise levels below 45 dB for quiet operation.

Don't wait to stay warm and comfortable this season. Get your KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat now and enjoy rapid heat generation, intuitive controls, and portable convenience. Perfect for spaces up to 200 square feet, this heater is a must-have for chilly days and nights. Stay cozy with KISSAIR!
